verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to the Gittith. A Psalm of David. O Jehovah <WH3068>, our Lord <WH113>, How excellent <WH117> is thy name <WH8034> in all the earth <WH776>, Who hast set <WH5414> thy glory <WH1935> upon the heavens <WH8064>!

Out of the mouth <WH6310> of babes <WH5768> and sucklings <WH3243> hast thou established <WH3245> strength <WH5797>, because of thine adversaries <WH6887>, that thou mightest still <WH7673> the enemy <WH341> and the avenger <WH5358>.
When I consider <WH7200> thy heavens <WH8064>, the work <WH4639> of thy fingers <WH676>, The moon <WH3394> and the stars <WH3556>, which thou hast ordained <WH3559>;
What is man <WH582>, that thou art mindful <WH2142> of him <WH1121>? And the son of man <WH120>, that thou visitest him <WH6485>?
For thou hast made him but little <WH4592> lower <WH2637> than God <WH430>, And crownest <WH5849> him with glory <WH3519> and honor <WH3519>.
Thou makest him to have dominion <WH4910> over the works <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>; Thou hast put <WH7896> all things under his feet <WH7272>:
All sheep <WH6792> and oxen <WH504>, Yea <WH929>, and the beasts of the field <WH7704>,
The birds <WH6833> of the heavens <WH8064>, and the fish <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220>, Whatsoever passeth through <WH5674> the paths <WH734> of the seas <WH3220>.
O Jehovah <WH3068>, our Lord <WH113>, How excellent <WH117> is thy name <WH8034> in all the earth <WH776>!
